comments: The number of simple labeled graphs on n nodes whose connected components are wheels. - _Geoffrey Critzer_, Dec 10 2011
references: R. P. Stanley, Enumerative Combinatorics, Cambridge, Vol. 2, 1999; see Problem 5.15(c).
links: Vladimir Kruchinin, D. V. Kruchinin, Composita and their properties, arXiv:1103.2582
formula: a(n) = n!*sum((-2)^(-m)/m!*sum(C(m,k)*sum(2^(k-i)*sum(C(k,j)*C(j,i-3*k+2*j), j=0..k)*(-1)^(n-m-i-2*(m-k))*(m-k)!/(n-m-i)!*stirling1(n-m-i,m-k), i=k..n-2*m+k), k=0..m), m=1..n), n>0. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Sep 10 2010
mathematica: nn = 16; a = Sum[(n (n - 2)!/2) x^n/n!, {n, 5, nn}]; Range[0, nn]! CoefficientList[Series[Exp[x^4/4! + a], {x, 0, nn}], x]  (* _Geoffrey Critzer_, Dec 10 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 16 2000
